begin with white - safety eyes should be places between rounds 17 and 18 at 12 stitches apart - stuff as you go 1 work 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring 6 2 increase around 12 3 single_crochet increase around 18 4 single_crochet increase single_crochet around 24 5 3 single_crochet increase around 30 6 2 single_crochet increase 2 single_crochet around 36 7 5 single_crochet increase around 42 8 single_crochet around 42 9 3 single_crochet increase 3 single_crochet around 48 10 single_crochet around 48 11 7 single_crochet increase around 54 12 13 single_crochet around 54 14 4 single_crochet increase 4 single_crochet around 60 15 18 single_crochet around 60 19 4 single_crochet decrease 4 single_crochet around 54 20 21 single_crochet around 54 22 7 single_crochet decrease around 48 23 single_crochet around 48 24 3 single_crochet decrease 3 single_crochet around 42 25 single_crochet around 42 26 5 single_crochet decrease around 36 27 2 single_crochet decrease 2 single_crochet around 30 29 3 single_crochet decrease around 24 30 single_crochet decrease single_crochet around 18 31 single_crochet decrease around 12 32 decrease around 6 - f/o sew shut copyright © 2022 icrochetthings 4/5 snout - begin with blue 1 chain 4 skip 1st chain 2 single_crochet increase working on the opposite side of the chs 2 single_crochet increase 8 2 increase single_crochet 3 increase single_crochet 2 increase 14 - slip_stitch f/o leave long tail for sewing fins x 4 - begin with white 1 work 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring 6 2 single_crochet increase single_crochet around 8 3 4 single_crochet around 8 5 chain 1 flatten piece and work across the top single_crochet across 4 - f/o leave long tail for sewing copyright © 2022 icrochetthings 5/5 assembly cut off a 12 length of dark gray yarn and remove one of the plies use the remaining plies to embroider a nose and mouth onto the snout sew the snout onto the front of the body sew two fins on either side of the body sew the remaining two fins next to each other on the back of the body copyright © 2022 icrochetthings
